item.title: SCANIA 124G=420 FRONTAL 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

SCANIA 124G=420 FRONTAL 1.54 ETS2

Description for Mod Scania 124G 420 Frontal ETS2 1.54:
Dominate the roads of Euro Truck Simulator 2 with the classic and robust Scania 124G 420 Frontal!
Relive the power and unmistakable style of the legendary Scania 124G with this detailed and realistic mod for version 1.54 of ETS2. This front-end truck, a true icon of the roads, offers an authentic and immersive driving experience.

Main Features:
Detailed 3D Model: Experience the accuracy of a faithful 3D model of the Scania 124G 420 Frontal, with all the exterior and interior details carefully recreated.
Powerful Engine: Enjoy the strength of the 420 horsepower engine, perfectly tuned to face the challenges of virtual roads.

Realistic Sounds: Immerse yourself in the experience with authentic engine sounds and other sound effects that heighten the realism.
Authentic Interior: Feel in control with a detailed and functional interior, reproducing the characteristic environment of the Scania 124G.
ETS2 1.54 Compatibility: This mod has been specifically developed and tested to ensure full compatibility with Euro Truck Simulator 2 version 1.54.
Customization Options: (Depending on the mod creator, may include) Explore various customization options, such as paint jobs, accessories and tuning to make your truck unique.

Ideal for:
Fans of Scania and classic trucks.
Players looking for a nostalgic and authentic driving experience.
Enthusiasts who appreciate high-quality mods and attention to detail.

Get ready to hit the road with style and power! Add the Scania 124G 420 Frontal to your game and feel the difference!

Credits: NATINHO GAMER

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Utility 2000R v1.4.1 1.54 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Utility 2000R v1.4.1 1.54 ATS

Changelog v1.4.1
– 1.54 cargo system support
– fixed possible issue with license plate locators on non-pintle rear end

This mod adds a 1988 Utility 2000R 40′ x 96″ reefer trailer. It features
an animated Thermo King Super II refrigeration unit, advanced coupling,
and full use of the trailer paintjob system’s current feature set.

Credits: Smarty

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Mercedes SK 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Mercedes SK 1.54 ETS2

Description for the Mercedes-Benz SK Mod
Experience classic robustness and reliability with the Mercedes-Benz SK mod!
This mod brings to your simulator the legendary Mercedes-Benz SK series, a line of trucks that marked an era for their strength, durability and functional design. Get ready to relive the experience of driving a true giant of the road, known for its ability to face any challenge.
With the Mercedes-Benz SK mod, you will be able to enjoy:

Detailed and authentic modeling: A faithful recreation of the iconic SK series, with attention to the details that made it famous, from the robust cabin to the various chassis and configurations available.
Period customization options: Choose from different types of cabins, bodies, accessories and paintwork that recall the years of production of the SK series, allowing you to customize your truck to your style.
Distinctive engine sounds: Immerse yourself in the unique sound experience of Mercedes-Benz engines of the period, carefully recorded to provide a nostalgic and authentic immersion.
Realistic driving experience: Experience the characteristic handling of SK trucks, with their robustness and the power of their engines.

If you are a classic truck enthusiast and are looking for a reliable and powerful vehicle for your virtual journeys, the Mercedes-Benz SK mod is an essential addition to your collection. Get ready to dominate the roads with the strength and tradition of Mercedes-Benz!
Keywords: Mercedes-Benz SK, Mercedes SK, mod, classic truck, simulator, Germany, robustness, reliability, authentic sounds, classic customization.

Credits: GEMINNE

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Smarty’s Wheel Pack v1.10.2 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 30, 2025

Smarty’s Wheel Pack v1.10.2 1.54 ETS2

Changelog v1.10.2
– Fixed crash when using grease hub on trailer steer axle
– Added (fictional) whitewall version of Goodyear Super Hi-Miler
1.10.1
– Fixed material assignments on Accuride 28807 that were affecting paintability on some pieces

This contains an Alcoa 22.5×11.75 widebase rim with a compatible Michelin XZY3 385/65R22.5 tire. The rim is a thoroughly de-polied version of RBR-DUK’s Alcoa widebase. The combined poly count is less than 9000 tris and so should perform well on mid- to high-range computers

Credits: Smarty

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
